posts.content:
from a friend this morning
"Hi Peeps,

A friend of mine at work had her beetle stolen last night from Hilsea.

It was a classic beetle, currently painted up as Herbie, registration ends HKN.

It had no engine or seats in it as it was being restored.

If anyone sees one about could you please let me know so she can look into it? Also if you could ask about maybe someone else may know something about it."
